solution_line_template: He needs {tank_capacity} - {already_contained} = <<{tank_capacity}-{already_contained}={liters_needed}>>{liters_needed} liters more to have a full tank of gas.
Donny will pay {liters_needed} x ${cost_per_liter} = $<<{liters_needed}*{cost_per_liter}={total_cost}>>{total_cost} for a full tank of gas.
